PerformOneGeneration

TrimSpeciesBackToElite
private void TrimSpeciesBackToElite(
out bool emptySpeciesFlag
)

Loops through species, and for each trims the species genomeList back to the number of elite genomes defined for that species.

The genomes in species.GenomeList are ordered best to worst, thus genomes are removed from the end of the lists.

Parameter
emptySpeciesFlag
out bool

Returns true if there is at least one empty species following trimming.

RebuildGenomeList
private void RebuildGenomeList()

Rebuild _genomeList from genomes held within the species.

List<NeatGenome<T>> offspringList,
out ulong evaluationCount
)

Perform the genome evaluation stage of the evolution algorithm.

Parameters
offspringList
List<NeatGenome<T>>

The list of offspring genomes to evaluate.

evaluationCount
out ulong

Returns the number of evaluations that were performed.
